title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Beat eggs with parmesan cheese in a bowl.
Combine cooked spaghetti with bacon and remove from heat.
Quickly mix in egg and cheese mixture.
Season with salt and black pepper, then serve immediately.
